ing: 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
des: "As close to restaurant sweet and sour sauce as I could get. This sauce is a big hit always."
ins: Mix dark brown sugar, cornstarch, garlic powder, and ground ginger together in a saucepan until well-combined. Add red wine vinegar, pineapple juice, and soy sauce. Cook and stir over medium heat until bubbling, about 8 minutes. Add crushed pineapple; cook until thickened, 2 to 3 minutes more.
